author: jkatz@endeavorb2b.com (Jonathan Katz)

title: Slideshow: Chemical Industry Products to Watch - October 2025

title_detail.value: Slideshow: Chemical Industry Products to Watch - October 2025

summary: This month’s roundup features five industrial technologies designed to improve efficiency, reliability and process precision. Highlights include ABB’s cybersecurity-enabled gas chromatograph, Emerson’s in situ oxygen analyzer, ROSS’ ergonomic ribbon blender for powders, ARO’s efficient diaphragm pump, and BinMaster’s rugged VRX vibrating probes for bulk solids. Each product offers operational improvements, simplified maintenance, and enhanced process monitoring for a range of industrial applications.

summary_detail.value: This month’s roundup features five industrial technologies designed to improve efficiency, reliability and process precision. Highlights include ABB’s cybersecurity-enabled gas chromatograph, Emerson’s in situ oxygen analyzer, ROSS’ ergonomic ribbon blender for powders, ARO’s efficient diaphragm pump, and BinMaster’s rugged VRX vibrating probes for bulk solids. Each product offers operational improvements, simplified maintenance, and enhanced process monitoring for a range of industrial applications.
